sentences.sentence: In domestic market, we have won high reputation for our hot-sale bannocks.
sentences.translation: 在国内市场，我们享有高度名声，那是因为我们的烙饼不仅热门且受到肯定。

sentences.sentence: We have high confidence in maintaining the quality of the bannocks and providing fresh bannocks all the time.
sentences.translation: 我们做烙饼业已有多年，对于产品的新鲜及品质持有高度的信心。
